[John Agnello](https://www.discogs.com/artist/85454 ‘Recording and mixing engineer. Starting his recording career as an assistant engineer at the [l265540], John was able to work on some legendary early 80’s albums including [m101681], [m36940], [m46999], [m68247], [m28859] and [m99891]. As he went out on his own, John had a string of successes recording albums with [a288982], [a317696], [a267857] and [a137751].
